comments:
Please dispatch it to right list. I am not sure which group is the owner of
ProjectExplorer.

This bug is file against I20050603. 

Reprod:
-------
1/ Clean up the workspace
2/ Launch Eclipse
3/ Right-click on "Dynamic Web Projects" node

The following lines is shown in console that launch eclipse.

"Unhandled event loop exception

null argument:"

----------
Once a project is created, the context menu show as expected.
Problem is obviously fixed a while ago.
